## react-redux-api package

API constants for React contexts.

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ReactReduxContextType](./react-redux-api.reactreduxcontexttype.md) | Reverse engineering of the correct type of the <code>ReactReduxContext</code>. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./react-redux-api.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
|  [WCH\_CONTEXT\_REACT\_REDUX](./react-redux-api.wch_context_react_redux.md) | Injection token for the [react redux](https://react-redux.js.org/) store |
|  [WCH\_CONTEXT\_REDUX\_STORE](./react-redux-api.wch_context_redux_store.md) | Injection token for the redux store |
